name: CS Horizon
description:
This is a multiplayer FPS game.
You can't play this game without connecting to the server.
One team attacks, the other defends.
The attackers occupied all three bases before the end of time.
Defenders win by stopping attackers.
Attackers can occupy the base by having one or more players in the base.
Defenders can take back by being in the base.
Once a base is completely occupied, the battle goes to the next base.
